physDesc.p: Fragments 1-14 (in mm), (1) 30 x 58, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (2) 48 x 10, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (3) 21 x 22, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 31 x 13, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 4 lines, (5) 39 x 18, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (6) 60 x 23, (A) 2 lines, top margin, (B) 6 lines, top margin, (7) 42 x 40, (A) 5 lines, top left margins, (B) traces, (8) 62 x 23, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 53 x 41, (A) 4 lines, right margin (?), (B) 5 lines, no margins, (10) 59 x 37, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (11) 82 x 33, (A) 10 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (12) 62 x 76, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (13) 77 x 45, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (14) 76 x 49, (A) 5 lines, left top margins, (B) 5 lines, 2 col. (?), bottom margin
